data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fomichev, Alexander A., Marusik, Yuri M. (2017): A survey of East Palaearctic Lycosidae (Araneae). 12. Two new Mongolicosa species from Mongolia. Zootaxa 4221 (2): 233-241, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.248686|4 occurrences
